ctx: intros v a z1 z2 H q.
intros v a z1 z2 H q.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros v a z1 z2 H q.
exceptions.exn: The reference p was not found in the current environment.

original: intros v a z1 z2 H q. unfold substituteFormulaForall. apply eq_sig_uncurried. intros p. destruct v as [vn | vm]. + simpl. reflexivity. + specialize (H (forallH vm a) p q). simpl in H. injection H as H'. apply H'.
